medical_history.chief_complaint: Right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain, nausea, and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with a 6-hour history of RUQ pain that started approximately 30 minutes after eating pizza today. The pain began as a dull ache but progressed to severe pain over the course of the day. The patient subsequently experienced nausea and one episode of nonbloody, nonbilious vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Nephrolithiasis; Stress incontinence s/p urethral sling.
